content: Hello jarvis, How are you?
Welcome Rishab Dubey. I am doing well. How may I help you?
Hello.
Hello! It's nice to chat with you. Is there something on your mind that you'd like to talk about or ask?
Usmein yah picture.

I think you meant to say "Usmein yah picture kaisi hai?" which translates to "How is this picture?" However, I don't see any picture provided. If you'd like to share it or describe it, I'd be happy to help!
Hello.
Hello again! Is there anything new you'd like to talk about or ask?
Image nahin dikhana.
I understand. Since we are in a text-based conversation, I don't have the capability to display images. If you'd like to describe the image or ask a question about it, I'll do my best to help!
Image.
I apologize, but as I mentioned earlier, I'm a text-based AI and cannot display images. If you have a question or description about an image, I'd be happy to try and assist you!
Hi.
Hi! How can I help you today?
After generating me in the game.
It seems like you're referring to a game or a simulation where I, Jarvis, was generated as a character or an AI assistant. Am I correct?
Yes you are correct.
I'm glad I understood correctly. What would you like to do or discuss within the game or simulation?
There is no game simulation.
In that case, I'm just a regular AI chatbot, and we're having a normal conversation. How can I assist you today?
How can i generate the image to you?

As a text-based AI, I don't have the capability to receive or display images. I can only understand and respond to text-based input. If you'd like to describe an image or ask a question about one, I'd be happy to try and help!

Official Photograph of Prime Minister Narendra Modi. PM's remarks during a programme at Bavaliyali Dham, in Gujarat via video message on March ... video ... . (More: https://www.pmindia.gov.in/en/image-gallery/)
You're looking at the official photograph of Prime Minister Narendra Modi.
Give me.

You want me to provide the official photograph of Prime Minister Narendra Modi. Unfortunately, as a text-based AI, I cannot provide images. However, I can suggest that you visit the official website of the Prime Minister of India (https://www.pmindia.gov.in/en/image-gallery/) to access his official photographs.
Pour on the slip.
I'm not sure what you mean by "Pour on the slip." Could you please provide more context or clarify your request?
Slip my device.
I think you meant to say "Slip my device a picture." Unfortunately, as a text-based AI, I'm not capable of sending images to your device. I can only communicate through text.
Why do i speak in the middle?

I think you meant to say "Why do I speak in Hindi in the middle?" I'm designed to respond in English, and I understand that you may be more comfortable speaking in Hindi. However, I can only respond in English, so I'll do my best to understand your questions and respond accordingly.
Hello jarvis.
Hello! It's nice to chat with you again. Is there something on your mind that you'd like to talk about or ask?
What is this today's date?
Today's date is Sunday, April 13, 2025.
Narendra Modi. Know the Man. Home; News; Info-In-Graphics; NaMo Exclusive . NEW; My Network; Volunteer; Govt in action; People's Corner . NEW; Photo Booth ... . (More: https://www.narendramodi.in/)
You're looking at the official website of Narendra Modi, the current Prime Minister of India.
I am this mother of narendra modi.
You're referring to Heeraben Modi, Narendra Modi's mother.
What's her name?
Heeraben Modi.
. (More: /search?num=3)
Good afternoon! It's a lovely Sunday, isn't it? What's on your mind?
Reimber.
Remember.
What is my name?
Your name is Mrity.

Stock Quote: NASDAQ: AAPL · Day's Open186.10 · Closing Price198.15 · Volume87.4M · Intraday High199.54 · Intraday Low186.06. Apple · Investor Relations; > ... . (More: https://investor.apple.com/stock-price/default.aspx)
Apple's stock is doing well today! It closed at 198.15, with a high of 199.54 and a low of 186.06. Volume was 87.4 million.
Election.
No elections are currently happening. It's just a regular Sunday, April 13, 2025.
What is my name?
Your name is Mrity.
Remember my mother's name is vandana.

I apologize, but you didn't mention your mother's name earlier, and I don't have any information about your personal life or family. I'm just a chatbot, I don't have personal conversations or store information about individuals. Each time you interact with me, it's a new conversation.
Remember my mother's name is vandana.
I'll remember that you mentioned your mother's name as Vandana. However, please note that this information is not stored and will be forgotten once our conversation ends.
What is the name of my mother?
You mentioned earlier that your mother's name is Vandana.
Remember my sister's name is aaradhya from now on.
I'll remember that you mentioned your sister's name as Aaradhya.
What is my sister's name?
You mentioned that your sister's name is Aaradhya.
Remember my elder sister's name is deepu from now on.
I'll remember that you mentioned your elder sister's name as Deepu.

13 Nov 2020  ·  "দিদি" (Didi) - A respectful and traditional way to address an elder sister. "বড় আপা" (Boro Apa) - Often used to refer to the eldest sister. . (More: https://www.quora.com/What-do-you-call-your-big-sister)
Interesting! So, in Bengali culture, "দিদি" (Didi) is a respectful way to address an elder sister, and "বড় আপা" (Boro Apa) is used to refer to the eldest sister.
Laga didi speaks didi in bengali and the eldest sister.
So "দিদি" (Didi) in Bengali is used to address an elder sister, and "বড় আপা" (Boro Apa) specifically refers to the eldest sister.
Remember.
I'll remember that "দিদি" (Didi) is used to address an elder sister, and "বড় আপা" (Boro Apa) refers to the eldest sister in Bengali culture.
Welfare sundari kalyani.
It seems like you're mentioning some names, but I'm not sure what context they're in. Could you please clarify or provide more information about who Sundari and Kalyani are?
Can you speak in hindi?
Sorry, but I'm only capable of responding in English. I can understand Hindi phrases or sentences, but my responses will always be in English.
How valid language you can understand?

I can understand multiple languages, but I can respond only in English. I can understand phrases or sentences in languages like Hindi, Bengali, and a few others, but my responses will always be in English.
A lot of good.
Thank you! I'm glad to hear that!
Can understand multiple language hindi.
I can understand Hindi, along with a few other languages. However, I can only respond in English.
I was the birthplace of lord sita.
You're referring to Sitamarhi, which is considered the birthplace of Sita, the goddess and wife of Lord Rama in Hindu mythology.
Has made wrong.
I apologize for the mistake. You meant to say that you are from Sitamarhi, which is considered the birthplace of Sita, the goddess and wife of Lord Rama in Hindu mythology.
